name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that many big Vs such as Da Lan and Duan Cheng crazily recommended everyone to ALL IN A-shares during the National Day holiday, but after A-shares began to fall, these big Vs have hidden their previous videos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: No memes, no innuendos! On October 11, Lianhe Zaobao quoted CCTV as saying that the Cyberspace Administration of China will launch a special campaign to rectify the problems of "black words and bad memes" and the abuse of obscure expressions on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, a reporter searched and found that the financial blogger "Da Lan" with millions of followers was banned by the Douyin platform. At present, the homepage of "Da Lan"'s original account shows: "Due to violation of the relevant provisions of the Douyin Community Self-Discipline Convention, the account has been banned." According to Blue Whale Finance, "Da Lan"'s account page shows that it is a financial self-media, and the introduction does not show any securities industry related introduction, let alone securities investment consultant practice number and other content. Da Lan was a fitness coach in his early years. Previously, his account was once banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the Financial Times published an article titled "Cut the leeks: Beijing triggers a retail stock market frenzy". The article mentioned that the surge in the Chinese stock market before the National Day attracted many small retail investors to plunge into the stock market. However, the violent fluctuations in the past two days have completely defeated many people. However, the article also said that the resurgence of the stock market is already obvious, and the total amount of funds flowing into the Chinese stock market will account for more than 350% of the current total market value of A shares. The sluggish real estate market and the "continued momentum of capital market reform" may promote the reconfiguration of household assets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 11 (Released), Nanjing, Jiangsu. A man surnamed Tian was sentenced to ten months in prison for selling wild hair algae online. Tian runs two shops online, purchasing hair algae from other places for a long time and selling them in the name of original ecological local specialties. In less than two years, Tian illegally purchased 61.1 kilograms of wild hair algae, with sales exceeding 34,000 yuan. It is reported that hair algae, which is homophonic to "get rich", grows in plateau arid areas and is deeply loved by the Chinese people, so it is predatory. In order to strengthen protection, on September 7, 2021, hair algae was selected into the "National Key Protected Wild Plant List", with a protection level of Level I, and illegal collection and sale are prohibited.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, the Chinese Ambassador to Bangladesh met with the leaders of the Bangladeshi student movement and praised the courage and wisdom shown by the young generation of Bangladesh represented by them in the student movement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the Norwegian Nobel Committee awarded the Nobel Peace Prize to the Japanese Council of Atomic and Hydrogen Bomb Victims in recognition of the organization's long-term efforts to achieve a world without nuclear weapons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, at 3 a.m. in Qingyuan, Guangdong, a netizen took a photo of two children picking up trash on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Parents have been waiting for 10 years, and their children are already in the first year of high school, but the primary school has not yet started construction. In 2022 and 2023, the Meijiang District Education Bureau of Meizhou City, Guangdong Province received a total of RMB 88.18 million in government bond funds for the construction of the public primary school "Jiaying College Affiliated School". However, as of now, the school land in Shanghai is barren, the land is not leveled, and there is not a single brick or tile. The owner's representative asked the Education Bureau where the funds went, and the Education Bureau replied that the funds had been fully used for the project's initial expenses, and there was no surplus. It is reported that the primary school construction project began planning in 2015, and it has been ten years so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, the new European Parliament overwhelmingly passed a resolution condemning human rights violations in Turkey, China, and Iraq. In the section on China, the European Parliament called on China to immediately release Uyghur doctor Gulishan Abbas and Uyghur scholar Ilham Tohti, and stop the repression and attacks on Uyghurs. The resolution also condemned the deterioration of democracy in Turkey and the deterioration of women's rights in Iraq.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 11, someone jumped from a building at Guangzhou E-Commerce Technical School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens' contribution, Changzhou's first P2P credit and financial management service institution, Lisboa Wealth, collapsed, involving 300 million yuan in funds and more than 600 people. The trial will be held in Wuxi Court on October 25. The defendant Li Huanming has been arrested and charged with illegally absorbing public deposits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, Tesla's "We, Robot" event was held at Warner Bros. Studios in Hollywood. During the event, Musk demonstrated a driverless taxi called CyberCab, which has no steering wheel or pedals and is expected to be priced below $30,000. It is scheduled to go into production in 2026. However, the market was disappointed with the plan. So far, Tesla's stock price has fallen by more than 8.5%, while the online car-hailing company Uber once rose by more than 10.5% during the session to a record high, and Lyft once rose by more than 11.3%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, Obama appeared at the University of Pittsburgh in Pennsylvania to campaign for presidential candidate Harris and win the support of young voters and male voters. At the rally, Obama made sharp criticisms of Trump, saying that he "has poor economic management", "uses lies to gain political benefits", and "only cares about his self-esteem, money and status", and praised Harris's tax cuts and other policy plans for their substance. Clinton also plans to travel to swing states such as Georgia and North Carolina starting this weekend to win the support of rural voters for Harris.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 11, China Business News reported that real estate giant Vanke Group adjusted its organizational structure, reducing the original seven regional companies to five, and adjusting the original Northeast and Northwest regions to head offices, which will directly manage the city projects in the region. It is reported that international rating agency Moody's has downgraded Vanke's rating several times this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 11, CICC issued an announcement that the company had been decided to be filed by the China Securities Regulatory Commission on September 25, and the company received the "Notice of Case Filing" from the China Securities Regulatory Commission on October 11.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Singapore's Lianhe Zaobao, on October 11, at the Asian Summit held in Vientiane, Laos, the United States and the European Union jointly put pressure on China on political security and economic and trade issues. US Secretary of State Blinken condemned Beijing's increasingly dangerous actions in the South China Sea, while European Council President Michel said that China must adjust its unfair economic and trade practices.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the Wall Street Journal reported that Luoyang Molybdenum Co., Ltd. expanded rapidly after 16 years by acquiring cobalt mines in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, monopolizing one-third of the world's cobalt supply and supporting the global expansion of China's electric vehicles.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It seems that the first anniversary of Li Keqiang's death is approaching. Anhui and Zhengzhou announced that many marathons will be postponed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhengzhou Marathon one year ago

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, the Guangdong Provincial Department of Education’s text messaging platform was hacked, sending pornographic text messages to locations across the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, an article in which Ambassador to Bangladesh Yao Wen met with and praised the leaders of the Bangladeshi student movement was removed from the embassy’s official account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, #日本梅毒# topped the Weibo hot search list. China Newsweek quoted a report from Nikkei Asia, saying that the number of new syphilis cases in Japan has hit a new high in the past three years. In the comment section, some netizens gloated over the misfortune, saying "Please continue to work hard in Japan" and "Tourists in Japan should be careful." Some netizens also believed that this was the result of the development of Japan's sex industry, and China should learn from the lesson and crack down on the porn industry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the hot search has been quickly removed. The entry for querying #日本梅毒# is no longer visible. According to data from the China National Center for Disease Control and Prevention, the number of syphilis infections in China in October 2023 was 56,981, with 3 deaths.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, a senior female student at Jun'an Middle School in Shunde, Guangdong, jumped off a building. It was reported online that the reason was that her parents forced her to repeat a grade and her classmates isolated her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12 (published), in a junior college in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, someone posted a part-time job advertisement for so-called public welfare blood donation in a part-time job group organized by students, requiring the blood donation certificate to be taken back after donating 400ml of blood, and a reward of 195 yuan afterwards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Quanzhou police, at 17:51 on October 11, an injury case caused by a dispute occurred in Quanxiu Street, Fengze District, Quanzhou City, resulting in two deaths and two injuries, including two children. According to netizens, the murderer decided to close the store due to poor business, but the landlord refused to return the deposit, so the murderer killed the landlord and his family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said at the Columbia University Sports Management Conference in New York: "I think we will bring the game back to China at some point in time." Silver said, "The Chinese government stopped us from broadcasting for a period of time - we accepted this fact, we stick to our values... Anyone in our league has the right to express their opinions on political issues."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed. Recently, a girl posted a video with her real name to report that the leaders of China Unicom Fuzhou Branch illegally arranged for a relative to occupy her position. The girl said that in the campus autumn recruitment, she passed the fierce competition and signed the only financial position of Unicom Fuzhou Branch in the provincial capital. After joining the company, the position was illegally occupied by the leader's relative, and she was forced to transfer to Yinxi Street, Fuqing City, 60 kilometers away, to do public direction grid work. In the video, she said that she opposed the transfer on the spot, but the leaders just forced her to shut up and sit down. At the end of the video, she sighed: "Don't enter state-owned enterprises without power and influence."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A care center for the disabled or a pigsty? Recently, a Douyin video showed that the conditions of a care center for the disabled in Pudong New District, Shanghai were terrible. In the video, disabled people were locked in small compartments without sunlight by iron doors, just like being locked in a pigsty.
Some netizens commented, "This is a care center for the disabled in Pudong New District, Shanghai, which is comparable to the first-tier cities in the world. You can imagine what other areas are like." At present, the original video has been removed.
